thread.title: LOOK: Weightlifting Fairy Kim Bok-joo’s Lee Sung-kyung blooms in floral fashion
thread.title_full: LOOK: Weightlifting Fairy Kim Bok-joo’s Lee Sung-kyung blooms in floral fashion

author: jbalboa
title: LOOK: Weightlifting Fairy Kim Bok-joo’s Lee Sung-kyung blooms in floral fashion
text:
By: Clarisse Inao - Mobile Sub-editor / @ClarisseInaoINQ INQUIRER.net / 01:41 PM February 23, 2017 Lee Sung-kyung. Image: Viu Philippines 
Weightlifting Fairy Kim Bok-joo’s Lee Sung-kyung appeared fresh as a daisy in a photo shoot for a fashion magazine, K-Pop Herald reports 
The actress, who played the role of an athlete in the Korean drama, posed in floral-patterned and summer dresses for the photos, all taken in Bali in time for trendy summer looks. The leading lady from Weightlifting Fairy Kim Bok-joo in a form-fitting floral number. Image: Cosmopolitan via K-Pop Herald 
The model-turned-actress has lost some of the weight she put on for MBC’s 16-episode drama which ended in January ADVERTISEMENT 
In one photo, Lee wears a white, form-fitting dress adorned with blue and yellow blossoms, while holding a strappy red purse. Lee Sung-kyung in blue. Image: Cosmopolitan via K-Pop Herald 
Another photo shows her in a deep blue shirt with eyelet designs, and wearing sunglasses with gold-toned lenses. 
Lee, 27, recently provided the voice for the optimistic princess Poppy in the animated film “Trolls”, which was released Thursday.
